name: Dargon Defense
description:
While out on routine flight exercises you come across a bunch of unknown enemy forces. You must take them out before they achieve their sinister goals!
  • Steer your ship as it flies through the level.
  • Fire at enemies using Spacebar or Left-Mouse to earn points.
  • Try to beat your High Score! Good Luck and Enjoy!
This game was created as part of my participation in the "Complete C# Unity Developer 3D: Learn to Code Making Games" course.
